message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $100. Could we perhaps meet somewhere closer to $90?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've had other interested parties looking at the product, and I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
